div.strong: If you have any problems understanding this letter or your present position, do not hesitate to contact the Registrar of the Academy.
div.p: Despite having received several warning letters previously you continued to miss class hours at and you have now exceeded the maximum of 48 hrs per semester allowed. Your absences stand at no. hrs of absences at the date of the issues of this letter
div.strong: You have the right to appeal this decision and must do so, in writing, within 48 hours (2 working days) of the date of this letter.
div.p: The letter should be addressed to the Dean, clearly stating why you feel that you should be allowed to remain at the Academy and detailing any mitigating circumstances that contributed towards excessive absences. Any absences caused by medical reasons need to be supported by doctor certification(s).

Should the Academy not receive an appeal letter within the time mentioned above, we will not be able to consider your particular circumstances. Consequently, in line with the Standard of Excellence you will be asked to leave the school and the semester will be marked as failed.
The academics office is open from 9.00 am until 5.00 pm Monday to Friday.
div.strong: Please be informed that you are not eligible for any refund of the tuition fee!
